text: The shortages at VA facilities throughout the Phoenix area are unacceptable. Arizona's veterans deserve access to the care they were guaranteed, and anything short of that is disgraceful. I joined @RepAndyBiggsAZ & @RepGosar in calling on VA Sec. McDonough to address this issue. https://t.co/iM0BqbegFA

78 years ago, allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy in one of the most daring military operations in history. Today, on the anniversary of D-Day we remember the brave soldiers who fought in this battle and we honor those who gave their lives during that courageous attack. https://t.co/1A2LX3TP6u

What is President Biden's solution to this crisis? Spend, spend, and spend.
